snippet: ROSEN--Walter. After a hard fought battle with cancer, he died peacefully at home surrounded by his family on April 14th, just shy of his 82nd birthday. A Graduate of Forest Hills High School, proud owner of Juniors restaurant and a friend to all. He was a devoted husband of 56 years to Sandy (nee Puro), proud father of Brett and Debbie, Kevin, Alan and Leslie, loving grandfather of Jamie and David, Rachel, Kyle, Lily, Aidan and Leo, brother- in-law of Hildy and Ron Sanders and Naomi Puro and uncle of Craig and Joey. Services will be held on Sunday, April 17th at 11am at Old Westbury Hebrew Congregation, 21 Old Westbury Rd. Donations in his memory may be made to OHF, 201 East 19th St., Suite 12E, NY, NY 10003 www.ohf.org 1/3
